title: Ronnie and BB
description: An acrostic poem-story sends a special message to everyone that a friend in need is a friend indeed. Learn the basics of acrostic poetry from the author, Nicole Izmaylov and enjoy the beautiful illustrations by Valerie Bouthyette. People of all ages will enjoy this. WINNER OF THE 2010 GAYA AWARD (GEORGIA AUTHOR OF THE YEAR)
author: Nicole Izmaylov
